Mac users(Windows users this has no effect on you) - I pushed an update which fixes a text cursor issue when working in the design manager 2 IDE. If you are experiencing this issue - you can cause Google chrome to update your extensions by doing one of a few things:
1. close google chrome completely, re-open it. 
2. go to <chrome://extensions> toggle “Developer mode” click update.(you can turn developer mode off again if you want.
3. wait for Google Chrome to push the update to you, this could take a few days if you do not close google chrome often.
